title: 【临时工搬运】帝国旗舰-Flagship of our new Empire【内含材质包】
author: 筒子
txt_content:
帝国旗舰Flagship of our new Empire

[paper]作者原话[paper]
PLEASE USE THE LATEST CREATIVE-NODE TEXTURE PACK!!!!!link:[LINK]BEWARE OF MELTING ICE - THIS WAS BUILD WITH PLUGINS!!!!This, dear viewers, is the by far largest build I have ever tried to complete by myself.The entire ship in its current shape is 504 blocks long and it took me a little over 5 weeks to build it to the state you can now see on the screenshots above.Still, it is nowhere close to be finished and I cannot say if it will even look similar when I am done with it as I tend to change my mind alot while building along.The ship, when finished, will be featured in a seperate PMC post so please do not wait for any kind of updates on this post after the frist upload as those changes will all be included in the following upload.This project, along with many others from me was build on the Creative-Node creative megabuild server and the project would not be possible without the help of the following players:Pivotphone for being the server owner of my home for such a long timeTheShadyJester for helping out with his Admin-powershttp://www.planetminecraft.com/member/crankerman/ for the amazing render picture. thanks alot!capncake who build alot of the superstructure with me and suggested alot of the features.The entire CN memberbase for giving feedback and suggestions and keeping me motivated from the first to the last block.[book]简单翻译[book]请使用最新的材质包CREATIVE-NODE材质包（材质包我也搬运过来了，是百度云盘，大家放心下载）百度云盘
注意：小心冰块融化成水造成高空流水下面是本人自己的评价以及搬运的原因[diamond_gem]搬运理由[diamond_gem]这个战舰是我以前搬运的一个建筑的作者，这个作者朋克系列的建筑都做的非常的大气颜色也搭配的非常的好，不过从渲染以及细节上面来说还是没有最近的作品那么出彩的这个作者以前还有很多作品可以下载，只不过本人只搬运精品，那些太早的还是不搬了[painting]图片欣赏[painting]


[board]作者信息[board]*点击图片跳转作者个人详细介绍*更多搬运建筑请到：【临时工搬运】索引贴去寻找
